title: Faber-Castell Superhero Sketch Set
description:
This complete comic illustration set was developed with professional animators to include everything a beginner needs to start drawing their own superheroes. Learn the basics of drawing shapes, creating shadows, proper perspective and much more with the comprehensive guide to drawing and coloring. A perfect gift for the artistic superhero in your life.

  • Dimensions: 10.25 x 8.25 x 1 in.
  • Includes:
  • 3 black Pitt artist pens
  • 6 Goldfaber colored and graphite pencils
  • pencil sharpener
  • mechanical TK pencil with blue refills, like the pros use for initial sketches
  • eraser
  • sketch guide
